subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|光線|こうせん}}: a [[ray]] of [[light]]
* {{ja-r|新幹線|しんかんせん}}: A Japanese super express, [[bullet train]], a line of extremely fast trains which runs in Japan; [[w:shinkansen|shinkansen]]
* {{ja-r|宇宙線|うちゅうせん}}: [[cosmic ray]]s
* {{ja-r|紫外線|しがいせん}}: [[ultraviolet]] [[ray]]s
* {{ja-r|赤外線|せきがいせん}}: [[infrared]] [[rays]]
* {{ja-r|X%線|エックス%せん}}: [[X-ray]]s
* {{ja-r|線圈|せんけん}}: a [[coil]], a [[solenoid]]
